<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get repositories importance score</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v1/vcs-repository/repositories/importance-score"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the calculated importance score for each repository (string array), reflecting the repository’s relative security criticality.

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"repositoryIds"} required={true} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Repository importance score data for the requested repositories.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"repositoryId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"repositoryScore"} required={true} schemaName={"double"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","format":"double","description":" Relative importance of the repository as set by Prisma Cloud based on a data-driven approach. The score is a numerical value from 1 to 10."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"customRepositoryScore"} required={true} schemaName={"double"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"customComment"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"customReporter"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Email address of the user who last set the customRepositoryScore.","type":"string","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"customUpdatedAt"} required={true} schemaName={"double"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"customUpdatedAt: Date and time (in ms) when the customRepositoryScore was last set or modified.","type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"repositoryId\": \"string\",\n    \"repositoryScore\": 0,\n    \"customRepositoryScore\": 0,\n    \"customComment\": \"string\",\n    \"customReporter\": \"string\",\n    \"customUpdatedAt\": 0\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example 1"} value={"Example 1"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"repositoryId\": \"XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX\",\n    \"repositoryScore\": 5,\n    \"customRepositoryScore\": 1,\n    \"customComment\": \"custom repo score \"repositoryScore\": 10,\n    \"customRepositoryScore\": null,\n    \"customComment\": null,\n    \"customReporter\": null,\n    \"customUpdatedAt\": null\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

Maximum 5000 repositories can be updated within a single request

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

Unauthorized repositoryIds
